name: @adarok/wpmovejs
description: TypeScript CLI to move/sync WordPress between environments (JS reimplementation of wordmove)

scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && vitest run --config vitest.e2e.config.ts
scripts.test:e2e:setup: mkdir -p /tmp/wpmovejs-e2e-ssh && (test -f /tmp/wpmovejs-e2e-ssh/id_ed25519.pub || ssh-keygen -t ed25519 -f /tmp/wpmovejs-e2e-ssh/id_ed25519 -N '' -C wpmovejs-e2e-test) && SSH_PUBLIC_KEY=$(cat /tmp/wpmovejs-e2e-ssh/id_ed25519.pub) SSH_KEY_DIR=/tmp/wpmovejs-e2e-ssh docker compose -f tests/e2e/docker/docker-compose.yml -p wpmovejs-e2e up -d --build
scripts.test:e2e:full: npm run test:e2e:setup && npm run test:e2e; npm run test:e2e:teardown
scripts.prerelease: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.release: node -e "const v = require('./package.json').version; const c = require('fs').readFileSync('CHANGELOG.md','utf8'); if (!c.includes('['+v+']')) { console.error('ERROR: CHANGELOG.md missing entry for version '+v); process.exit(1); }" && git add -A && git diff --cached --quiet || git commit -m "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag -f "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git push && git push --tags
